item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jonathan Safran Foer
item.description: "I love you also means I love you more than anyone loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that no one loves you, or has loved you, or will love you, and also, I love you in a way that I love no one else, and never have loved anyone else, and never will love anyone else." -- Jonathan Safran Foer

item.title: Lisa add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "It seemed that the only lover she had ever wanted was a lover in a dream." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Ray Bradbury
Lisa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "(and i think i could i think i could yes i think i could)" -- Stephen King

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "(<I>how I wish you were fear</i>)" -- Stephen King

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "No person ever died that had a family." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "That's the trouble with living things. Don't last very long. Kittens one day, old cats the next. And then just memories. And the memories fade and blend and smudge together." -- Neil Gaiman
